byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein contributed reporting from Kabul, and Eric Schmitt and Matthew Rosenberg from Washington.

abstract: Officials say Taliban captures at least 13 Afghan soldiers and two foreigners after their aircraft makes emergency landing in Faryab Province, Afghanistan
lead_paragraph: A firefight with the Taliban after the emergency landing killed at least three Afghan soldiers, and at least 13 were taken prisoner, along with two foreigners.

headline.main: Afghan Soldiers and Foreigners Captured After Landing in Taliban-Held Area
headline.print_headline: Afghan Troops and Foreigners Are Taken Prisoner by Taliban

snippet: A firefight with the Taliban after the emergency landing killed at least three Afghan soldiers, and at least 13 were taken prisoner, along with two foreigners.
